BriefcaseRuleFilter.name: BriefcaseRuleFilter
BriefcaseRuleFilter.description: Represents a filter criteria for a briefcase rule.

BriefcaseRuleId.description: Required. ID of the briefcase rule.

FilterOperator.description: Required. The comparison operator for this rule filter.

FilterSeqNumber.description: Required. The filter number. When you apply multiple filters, the filters are numbered sequentially, 1, 2, 3, and so on.

FilterValue.description: The value for the field and criteria. For example, true or false for a boolean field whose criteria or filter operator is Equals. Capitalization matters with date filter operators. Be sure to specify date literals in uppercase. Some valid date literals include TODAY, YESTERDAY and TOMORROW.

TargetEntityField.description: Required. The field to filter by. Compound fields and encrypted fields arenâ€™t supported. Label is Field.
